lines: I've been thinking much about ships these past days. And, you know, I don't believe Limsa Lominsa would be the nation she is now without them! Could you imagine how that would affect fishing? Trade? Naval defense!?
All those vessels are constructed by skilled armorers and smitties, so, if you think of Limsa as a ship, you might consider such artisans to be the sturdy keel on which the rest of the city is built.
Forename! How fare your efforts at the forge? I trust your growing fame hasn't convinced you to neglect your skills?
We all need the abundant inspiration your impeccable armorcraft provides! Speaking of which, I must needs return to my latest creation─just as soon as I find my pliers...

obj.n: Gants de forgeron en cuir de sanglier
